desc: Aran sweaters, fisherman sweaters, cable knit sweaters, warm hats and scarfs made from superfine Merino wool, in Ireland, curated for the US market. Free shipping, exchanges and returns, both ways, on all orders. Receive 15% off your first order when you join the herd.

layout.text: Made from a luxurious blend of 95% Merino wool and 5% cashmere.
